concept.title: Set Model Space Viewports
concept.shortdesc: In large or complex drawings, displaying different views reduces the time needed to zoom or pan in a single view. Also, errors you might miss in one view may be apparent in the others.

conbody.p: Viewports created on the Model tab completely fill the drawing area and do not overlap. As you make
changes in one viewport, the others are updated simultaneously. Three model space viewports are shown in the illustration.
